components.label: HTML
components.content: You’re still working on your application

components.label: HTML
components.content: You have not yet submitted your application. Click below to continue editing your application.

components.title: Submitted and In progress Panel
components.customConditional: show = data.applicationStatus === "Submitted" || data.applicationStatus === "In Progress" && data.applicationPIRStatus === "Not Required";
components.label: Submitted and In progress Panel
HTML
components.content: Congratulations! Application sent

components.label: HTML
components.content: Your application has sent to StudentAid BC and is in progress. No need to stick around — you’ll get notified by email with any updates to your application.

components.label: HTML
components.content: We are waiting for additional information

components.label: HTML
components.content: We are awaiting information from your institition, your application cannot be asssed until this has been received.

components.label: HTML
components.content: We’re sorry your institution has been declined your application

components.label: HTML
components.content:
The institution that were intending to apply to has informed us that you are not currently enrolled for classes. Reason: {{ data.applicationPIRDeniedReason }}

You may edit your application’s program and study period and resubmit this application for reconsideration.

components.label: HTML
components.content: Please confirm your assessment

components.label: HTML
components.content:
Your assessment is ready.

You must view and confirm what funds you would like to receive for this application to move forward.

components.label: HTML
components.content: We are waiting for your insitution to confirm your enrolment

components.label: HTML
components.content: {{ data.applicationInstitutionName }} will confirm your enrolment closer to your study start date. Once confirmed StudentAidBC can disburse your loan and/or grants.

components.label: HTML
components.content: We’re sorry your enrolment has been declined

components.label: HTML
components.content:
The institution that were intending to apply to has informed us that you are not currently enrolled for classes. Reason: {{ data.applicationCOEDeniedReason }}

You may edit your application’s program and study period and resubmit this application for reconsideration.

components.label: HTML
components.content: Your application is complete

components.label: HTML
components.content: Your assessment

components.label: HTML
components.content: See a detailed breakdown of your funding by viewing your asssessment
